prompt_base: small anthropomorphic Shiba Inu dog ninja, lean athletic physique, realistic brown fur texture, fierce determined expression, katana on back, 8k cinematic photo, dynamic lighting
feature_prompt: sharp focus on dog jawline and teeth, subtle snout wrinkles, detailed metallic texture on katana and hilt, high quality fabric weave on ninja outfit, sharp focus
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, human hands, human face, smooth skin, plastic costume, low quality, blurry, friendly, pet, fur doll
